metadata.name: Franksy - Chrome and Blue - 2/50
metadata.description: This is the first ever Wilder Artifact on the Ethereum blockchain - This work will have a limited edition of 50 and never be released again following the initial 50 being purchased on Wilderworld.com. The owner will get an active link of the sculpture in augmented reality they can use from their mobile device.
metadata.tags: Franksy, Banksy, AR, Augmented Reality, Medici, The Heist, Wilder World, Frank Wilder, Wilder Artifact, Totem
